job_title: Agentforce Authoring - Core Engineer, Front End - MTS/ SMTS
job_description:
• Life at Salesforce Our Locations Our Locations North America Europe, Middle East, and Africa Asia Pacific Latin America Our Teams Our Teams Sales Technology & Product Customer Success Corporate Roles AI Research University University Overview Interns New Grads Advanced Degrees Associate Program Manager Talent Programs Talent Programs Overview Future Pathways India Return to Work Military Fellows Our Story Newsroom Blog Careers Trust Salesforce.
• Org Sustainability Investors Give us your Feedback Sitemap Legal Terms of Service Privacy Information Responsible Disclosure Trust Contact Manage Preferences Build key parts of the Authoring Experience: Agent Canvas, AgentScript Editor, Agentforce StudioContribute to continual improvement of methodologies, best practices, tools and techniques for more effective product usageWork with product management and sales/services teams to produce a highly configurable and easy to implement product 3+ years UI development experience with emphasis on web front-end developmentExpert HTML, JavaScript, and CSS knowledge including experience with and/or contribution to popular frameworks like jQuery, backbone, d3.
• JsA related technical degree required.
• Interest in application development frameworks University Overview Interns New Grads Advanced Degrees Associate Program Manager.

• Develop and enhance automation features based on product and infrastructure requirements.
• Experience designing, executing, or improving system validation, including CPU, GPU, memory, BIOS, BMC, networking, and storage subsystems.
• Hands-on experience analyzing system logs, debugging failures, or conducting root-cause isolation.
• Bachelor’s degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, Computer Science, or a related technical fieldMaster’s degree in Electrical Engineering preferred Bachelor’s degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, Computer Science, or a related technical fieldMaster’s degree in Electrical Engineering preferred AMD Partner Hub Authorized Distributors AMD University Program Investor Relations Financial Information Board of Directors Governance Documents SEC Filings.
• Create and execute test procedures to validate the design of system components on next-generation machine learning architectures, including CPU/GPU/Memory/BIOS/BMC/I/O/Storage/Networking.
• Translate system specifications into comprehensive system integration test plans.
• Improve system-level integration test strategies, methodologies, and processes.
• Collaborate with cross-functional hardware and software teams to debug and resolve complex issues.
